EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-19-CAE-Denver-092617-3b.EM-2017-08-30-CAE Denver #3
EmailTemplate.subject: Let Turbonomic Take You Out to the Rockies game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re looking forward to an evening at AT&T Park next week filled with food, drinks, and of course baseball as the Colorado Rockies take on the Miami Marlins.
Will you join us with Corus360 and your technology peers on September 26th? Reserve your spot today for an evening of fun on us.
Colorado Rockies vs Miami Marlins <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>
Where: Coors Field 2001 Blake St., Denver, CO 80205 Tuesday, September 26th 6:40pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>
Please reach out to megan.gay@turbonomic.com or your account executives with any further questions.
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
